comments.author: rmsotiong@gmail.com
comments.creator: rmsotiong@gmail.com
comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:2.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0.1
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:2.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0.1

Sometime I do not need the app tabs, so option compacting and expand them into one button/tab would be good. I believe some are using apptabs as bookmarks, so if I have many, sometimes it is distracting. If I can compact them, and expand them later would be a good feature

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1.N/A
2.
3.

Actual Results:  
Feature request

Expected Results:  
Feature request
